_source.short_desc: CareerPlug's mission is to provide easy-to-use software and proactive services to make hiring easier.
_source.long_desc: Since 2007 CareerPlug has worked to make hiring easier for over 10,000 growing companies in the U.S. and Canada. We designed our hiring software for non-HR people so every owner, operator, and hiring manager can make the right hires for their team. Our applicant tracking system is designed to help you attract more quality applicants, give you the tools to make better hiring decisions, and save you time!
_source.target_audience: We work with a number of growing businesses, specializing in making hiring easier for decentralized businesses with multiple locations and franchise systems.

category_features.name: Aptitude Testing
category_features.definition: Measure for aptitude to uncover talents, reveal strengths and assess performance

category_features.name: Automatic Grading
category_features.definition: Automatically score assessment results

category_features.name: Candidate Comparison
category_features.definition: Compare candidate?s testing results against each other and against set benchmarks

category_features.name: Candidate Management
category_features.definition: Build, track, and maintain relationships with candidates.

category_features.name: Customizable Tests
category_features.definition: Create tailored assessments that test for specific relevant skills

category_features.name: Online Tests
category_features.definition: Exams administered online via computers or other electronic devices

category_features.name: Personality Testing
category_features.definition: Identify work styles and characteristics to determine behavioral fits

category_features.name: Pre-made Test Library
category_features.definition: A set of pre-made tests offered by a third party

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Skills Assessment
category_features.definition: Observe employees over a period of time to gain an understanding of their abilities to perform certain tasks

category_features.name: Tests/Assessments
category_features.definition: Create tools to measure student retention of learning material and lessons

category_features.name: Assessment Management
category_features.definition: Create tests or questionnaires

category_features.name: Background Screening
category_features.definition: Check individuals' criminal, financial, and other records

category_features.name: Candidate Tracking
category_features.definition: Record interactions, notes, and developments with candidates

category_features.name: Internal HR
category_features.definition: Recruiting software for internal recruiters or HR hiring managers

category_features.name: Interview Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule an interview via a calendar

category_features.name: Job Posting
category_features.definition: Post, track, and manage open jobs on multiple channels (e.g. job board, company's career site)

category_features.name: Onboarding
category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.name: Recruiting Firms
category_features.definition: Recruiting software for external or 3rd party recruiting firms

category_features.name: Resume Parsing
category_features.definition: Conversion of a resume into a a structured form for storage purposes

category_features.name: Resume Search
category_features.definition: Search through the software for stored resumes

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

related_products.short_desc:
TestGorilla works. CVs don't. 

Screening tests designed to make difficult hiring decisions faster, easier, and bias-free.
related_products.features:
TestGorilla provides you with the best pre-employment testing tools to screen your candidates so you can make better hiring decisions faster. 

Using multiple test types in an assessment gives the best predictive value, and we have a growing test library of 150+ tests including: cognitive ability tests, programming tests, software skill tests, personality tests, culture fit tests, language tests, and much more.

Start predicting real-world job performance today!

related_products.short_desc: WonScore is a pre-hire testing platform that assesses and ranks candidates in 3 areas scientifically proven to predict job performance.
related_products.features: Backed by extensive scientific I-O research, WonScore analyzes three crucial components of a candidate: cognitive ability, personality, and motivation. Using this data, we ensure that you are hiring the most qualified person for your position and team. You're able to access all of the results, which boil down to one score you can compare based on your needs. It's quick, easy, painless, and most importantly it works.

related_products.short_desc: Reduce the cost-of-hiring by 70% and time-to-hire by 60% by using trusted pre-employment tests and behavioral assessments from eSkill.
related_products.features: The eSkill Talent Assessment Platform makes it easy for companies to assess employees skills and Job Fit. Clients work with a CSM or select questions from the vast skills test library and add their own questions to create employment assessments for a variety of industries and a wide range of jobs. They can also include questions that simulate real life tasks, and video response questions to get a comprehensive view of candidates so they can make hiring and training decisions with confidence.

related_products.short_desc: WizeHire will help you hire great people consistently using professional templates, easy-to-use software and expert hiring coaches!
related_products.features: WizeHire helps you create quality job ads using job ad templates and hiring coaches to attract more quality candidates. We post your ad to 60+ job boards and then help you assess candidates in one online dashboard with resumes and personality fit reports to find the right fit to grow your business.

related_products.short_desc: Make data-driven hiring decisions with skills, aptitude, personality, and emotional intelligence tests. Test anyone, anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Criteria is an assessment company dedicated to helping organizations make better talent decisions using objective, multidimensional data. By combining leading-edge data science with rigorous validation backed by I/O psychologists, we provide the most precise assessments available. Our suite of assessments is the most comprehensive on the market, covering aptitude, personality, emotional intelligence, and more to provide the most robust picture of talent.

related_products.short_desc: The Hire Talent is a pre-employment assessment company that focuses on behavioral and competency testing to assess potential new hires.
related_products.features:
The Hire Talent's pre-employment assessments predict your candidates' on-the-job success so you can make smarter hiring decisions. Our testing program assesses personality, interpersonal & communication skills, behavioral aptitude, honesty, integrity & attitude for a well-rounded approach. 

Our software is fully supported, administered and managed online via your own personalized client portal. We offer complimentary reporting, consulting and tons of hiring tools to help you make the best hires

related_products.short_desc: Candidates are automatically ranked based on their qualifications and assessment responses that correspond with position requirements.
related_products.features: TalentReef's flexible, configurable application and workflow allows hiring managers to set up pre-screening questions and assessments in a mobile-first application. The platform ranks candidates based on how their qualifications and assessment responses align with position requirements.

related_products.short_desc: Improve your quality of hire with our job-related whole-person employment tests. Measure knowledge, skills, personality, intelligence.
related_products.features: HR Avatar tests help busy managers hire people who perform better, get along with the team, and stay in the job. 200+ tests for the most popular jobs. Whole-person approach provides a detailed report of cognitive abilities, knowledge and skills, personality, emotional intelligence, risky behaviors, plus a bonus interview guide. Tests use simulations of job-related tasks with better results while providing higher candidate engagement. Live video interviews, remote proctoring, reference checks.

related_products.short_desc: Find top candidates instantly with TestDome's job skill tests.
related_products.features: Stop wasting time interviewing people who look good on paper but can't do the job. Find top candidates instantly with TestDome's job skill tests. We offer tests for a wide range of industries, including programming, accounting, customer service, project management, and more. Prevent cheating with webcam monitoring and duplicate email detection. Add multiple users at no additional charge

related_products.short_desc: We help companies see how candidates do job-related tasks so they can make hiring decisions based on performance, without bias.
related_products.features:
Vervoe's mission is to make hiring about merit, not background.

We help employers make hiring decisions based on how well candidates can actually do the job instead of how good they look on paper. Vervoe replaces the traditional hiring process with skills assessments and gives every candidate an opportunity to showcase their talent by doing job-related tasks. Then, Vervoe uses machine learning models to automatically rank candidates based on how well they perform.

similar_products.short_desc: CodeSignal is the leading pre-employment testing software that assesses developer candidates at every step of the hiring process.
similar_products.features: CodeSignal is the leading pre-employment testing software for technical hiring that uses state-of-the-art Coding Scores and real-world coding environments. Companies of all sizes already use CodeSignal's Certify, Test, and Interview products to assess developer candidates at every stage of the hiring process. Customers use CodeSignal to grow engineering teams rapidly, while saving engineering interview time, reducing turnover costs, removing hiring biases, and improving candidate experience.

similar_products.short_desc:
TestGorilla works. CVs don't. 

Screening tests designed to make difficult hiring decisions faster, easier, and bias-free.
similar_products.features:
TestGorilla provides you with the best pre-employment testing tools to screen your candidates so you can make better hiring decisions faster. 

Using multiple test types in an assessment gives the best predictive value, and we have a growing test library of 150+ tests including: cognitive ability tests, programming tests, software skill tests, personality tests, culture fit tests, language tests, and much more.

Start predicting real-world job performance today!

similar_products.short_desc: Make data-driven hiring decisions with skills, aptitude, personality, and emotional intelligence tests. Test anyone, anywhere, anytime.
similar_products.features: Criteria is an assessment company dedicated to helping organizations make better talent decisions using objective, multidimensional data. By combining leading-edge data science with rigorous validation backed by I/O psychologists, we provide the most precise assessments available. Our suite of assessments is the most comprehensive on the market, covering aptitude, personality, emotional intelligence, and more to provide the most robust picture of talent.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your quality of hire with our job-related whole-person employment tests. Measure knowledge, skills, personality, intelligence.
similar_products.features: HR Avatar tests help busy managers hire people who perform better, get along with the team, and stay in the job. 200+ tests for the most popular jobs. Whole-person approach provides a detailed report of cognitive abilities, knowledge and skills, personality, emotional intelligence, risky behaviors, plus a bonus interview guide. Tests use simulations of job-related tasks with better results while providing higher candidate engagement. Live video interviews, remote proctoring, reference checks.

similar_products.short_desc: Codility's evidence-based platform helps hiring teams predict the real-life skills of their candidates, at scale.
similar_products.features: Codility is a remote hiring platform for engineering teams. They use our platform to predict the real-life skills of their technical candidates at all stages of the hiring process, via unbiased and relevant assessments on CodeCheck, live technical interviews on CodeLive, and virtual recruitment events with CodeEvent - all remotely and at scale. This brings faster hiring, time savings, and gives engineers more time to solve problems that matter.

similar_products.short_desc: A skills assessment platform that helps enterprises make intelligent talent decisions using iMocha's Talent Analytics.
similar_products.features: iMocha provides skill-based Talent Analytics that help enterprises make intelligent Talent decisions. In order to cope with the rapidly changing skills requirement, Enterprise organisations are Hiring Talent or Developing their existing workforce. iMocha helps Enterprises hire job-fit candidates faster (Talent Acquisition) and measure the ROI of their L&D programs (Talent Development). Fortune 500 and large enterprises use iMocha's Talent Analytics to solve their Talent challenges.

similar_products.short_desc: Online pre-employment skills testing solution for finding and hiring the right person for the position.
similar_products.features: TestGenius pre-employment testing suite features HR assessments to measure office and computer skills, training, and public-safety dispatcher skills. Online and installed licensing available for all industries including public sector, universities, retail, financial, and private sector. Includes TestWriter for creating custom tests and integrates with many applicant tracking systems. FREE DEMOS. TestGenius is a product of Biddle Consulting Group, specialists in talent assessments since 1974.

similar_products.short_desc: Create simple and structured interview guides for your hiring team to ensure they're asking the right questions every time.
similar_products.features: interview builder improves your employment process by allowing you to create simple interview guides for each requisition that accurately evaluate a candidate's hard skills and cultural fit. You can select from thousands of questions based on industry, business, role, or interview type to ensure your hiring team is asking the right questions every time.

similar_products.short_desc: By combining technology and science, McQuaig's talent assessments help companies hire, develop, and retain employees long term.
similar_products.features: Choose the right people for the right roles with McQuaig. Our scientifically validated talent management solutions allow you to benchmark a role internally, recruit to the requirements of that role, develop your people based on their strengths, and retain your top performers. Rely on data-driven insights into your candidate's personality, behavioral traits, and cognitive ability with McQuaig's innovative platform, then utilize our development tools to keep your workforce engaged and growing.

similar_products.short_desc: An award winning game-based assessment tool that measures soft skills in prospective & existing employee's in a fun & engaging process.
similar_products.features:
Owiwi is a fun and engaging psychometric tool that accurately measures prospective and existing employee's soft skills. Think of a combination of advanced scientific methodology packed within an immersive game that candidates enjoy taking part in. 

We take away the stress in the hiring process for the candidate while eliminating the recruiter risk of hiring the wrong candidate by offering data-driven and bias-free insights and accelerating the screening/shortlisting process with automations.

similar_products.short_desc: Talent assessment platform revolutionizing how enterprises hire, grow and retain talent with predictive psychometric data.
similar_products.features:
Plum is a talent assessment platform that strips away bias and reveals human potential to revolutionize how global enterprises hire, grow, and retain talent. With unmatched scalability, Plum powers more objective talent decisions across the employee lifecycle using the predictive power of psychometric data.

Plum data is 4X more predictive of future job success than what you'll find on a resume.

similar_products.short_desc: Jobma is a cloud-based video interviewing software used globally that offers the best in business Video interviewing experience.
similar_products.features: Jobma is a digital interviewing platform, designed to save HR teams time and money when screening and hiring employees. Our innovative use of pre-recorded & live video interviews, audio interviews and digital assessments give employers the capability to drastically improve their quality of hire. We currently work with over 500 clients in 50 countries, 14 different languages and growing, our goal is to democratize access to HR technology by offering affordable rates at a global scale.

similar_products.short_desc: The world's first Ai Smart Interviewer that helps you win the right talent, fast.
similar_products.features:
Through a smart online chat, Sapia's Ai Smart Interviewer finds your perfect matches and progresses them directly to a video interview for your hiring team to review. Just two stages, and you've found the right talent for the job.

Everyone gets personalized insights from their interview - no one is ghosted.

Some of the most trusted global brands use Sapia to automate their volume hiring. It's quick to get started, with options ranging from off-the-shelf to bespoke interview experiences.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applicant Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applicant Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applicant Tracking software allows organizations to easily manage the hiring process by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. Applicant Tracking solutions can be used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates' skills against job requirements. Many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) include an interface that allows recruiters to manage all of an organization's job openings. Applicant Tracking software is related to Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Recruiting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Recruiting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Recruiting software helps recruiting, staffing and hiring agencies manage their operations by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. These solutions are used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates skills against job requirements. Recruiting software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Human Resource software, Talent Management software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reference Check software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reference Check tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reference Check software streamlines and automates the process of requesting and collecting job references. There are two types of Reference Check software. In the first type, candidates provide their referees? contact information to recruiters who then reach out to the referees through Reference Check software. The second type of software is a platform accessible by referees, candidates, recruiters, and HR professionals that allows candidates to reach out to the referees and collect references directly.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.
